title: Large Sunny 1 bed on Sheridan Rd - incl. AC/heat/water
posting_body: East Evanston one bedroom, a block to the beach
0.4 mile to the Purple Line (South Blvd) and 0.8 mile to Metra (Main St.)
Walk to dining and shopping on Chicago Ave and Main St.
Easy commute to Northwestern, downtown, St. Francis
Building includes laundry, bike storage, and elevator.
Rent includes heat, AC, cooking gas, water!
Call 773-929-6007 for more info or to schedule a showing.
Please reference you are interested in the 1 bed on Sheridan and your desired move date.
Leave a call back number for response.
